channel.title: The Axe IS DONE! (everyone needs to see it just sayin)
channel.description:
It Is Finished: Name-Demon's Destruction!
These are some mistakes that i just cant fix without screwing it up [img]http://i.imgur.com/bh6JKxS.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/OJLUbKY.png[/img]
This Is the wire frame of the Whole Thing! [img]http://i.imgur.com/WRqjVvW.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/cx5Kcux.png[/img]
AND HERE IT ISS!!!!! [img]http://i.imgur.com/IIti7bs.png[/img]
This is an old pic! [spoiler][img]http://i.imgur.com/LYexPca.png[/img][/spoiler]

item.title: The Axe IS DONE! (everyone needs to see it just sayin)
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

I can tell just by the look of the model where the faces are, and it is a little excessive.

When making models, try not to use the 6+ face cylinder prims. It uses too much poly you don’t need, instead make a square and rotate it on an angle so you’re it like | | |. It allows for easier manipulation and a whole lot less hassle then having one which seems “rounder”. It might seem a little blockish but a setting can be changed to make it smoother without adding all the faces.

Great design, just need to work on the execution. I look forward to seeing more models, and seeing you improve.

Read full topic
item.source: The Axe IS DONE! (everyone needs to see it just sayin)

item.title: The Axe IS DONE! (everyone needs to see it just sayin)
item.dc:creator: @naseem142 naseem142
item.description:
@naseem142 wrote:

I like the design of it but the color of the bottom handle doesn’t fit in , maybe make it the same color as above? , And what do you mean by not finished? what else are you going to modify or add to the model?
It’s nice to see people post models here , i wish it happens more often though. Keep it up bro!
